1. Line a colander or sieve with cheesecloth (or coffee filter) and set it over a bowl. 2. Pour in the yogurt and allow it to drip for an hour or so. 3. After the yogurt has drained, combine it, in a small bowl, with the cucumber, garlic, dill and salt. 4. Cover the bowl tightly with plastic wrap and refrigerate until just before serving.
